name: Hizzle Slideshows
author: Hizzle

sections.description:
Unlock the potential of your storytelling with Hizzle Slideshows – a plugin meticulously crafted to redefine how you present your content online.

Craftsmanship in Every Detail

At Hizzle, we adhere to the core principles of lightweight design, speed, and responsiveness. Our plugin is engineered to be feather-light, ensuring seamless performance without compromising on functionality.

Seamlessness at Your Fingertips

Creating stunning slideshows is a breeze with Hizzle Slideshows. Seamlessly integrated into the WordPress block editor, you can effortlessly add slides to your posts or pages, unleashing your creativity without constraints.

Infinite Possibilities, Effortlessly Realized

Whether you’re curating a product showcase, narrating a compelling story, or guiding users through a tutorial, our plugin offers unparalleled versatility. Customize each slide to perfection, aligning effortlessly with your creative vision.

Intuitive Design, Endless Potential

Our user-friendly interface puts the power of customization in your hands. Add images, text, videos, or any block with unparalleled ease – no coding expertise required.

Experience Unrivaled Performance

Rest easy knowing that your slideshows will shine on every screen. Hizzle Slideshows are meticulously optimized for responsiveness, delivering a flawless user experience across devices, from desktops to smartphones.

Lightning-Speed Performance, Every Time

In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, speed is paramount. Hizzle Slideshows is engineered for lightning-fast performance, ensuring swift loading times and an immersive browsing experience for your audience.

Need Assistance?

For dedicated support and assistance, visit our support forum on this page.

Features & Settings

  • Add unlimited slides effortlessly.
  • Seamlessly integrate any block into your slides.
  • Live preview your slides directly in the editor.
  • Ensure responsiveness across all devices.
  • Customize slides per view for optimal display.
  • Navigate with ease using prev/next buttons.
  • Utilize Autoplay for dynamic presentations.
  • Customize appearance to match your brand.
  • Toggle pagination visibility as per your preference.
  • Set dimensions and borders to images for precise control.
  • Maintain image aspect ratio for a polished look.
  • Expand images on click for enhanced viewing.
  • Fine-tune image scale for perfect presentation.
  • Apply filters for creative effects, including two-tone color transformations while retaining the original image integrity.
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to your WordPress Dashboard.
  2. Go to Plugins -> Add New.
  3. Search for Hizzle Slideshows.
  4. Click “Install Now” and then activate the plugin via the “Activate Plugin” link.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • [FIX] Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.0.4

  • [NEW] slides reorder functionality.
  • [NEW] Transitioned to using Composer’s autoloader and namespace mechanism.

1.0.3

  • [ENHANCEMENT] Added 5+ filters for more customization.
  • [NEW] Freemius integration!
  • [FIX] Bug fixes and enhancements.
  • [NEW] Added blueprint.json file for users’ preview in WordPress.

1.0.2

  • [NEW] Added plugin menu for easier access.
  • [NEW] Introduced a help submenu page for user guidance.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Covert anything into a slideshow in minutes, with settings for complete customization and control.
